Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 11 Upādānagocchaka » 11.1 Upādānaduka » 11.1.7 Pañhāvāra
11.1.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Upādānagocchaka
Upādānaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
42.
3632Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe nava, naadhipatiyā nava…pe…  naaññamaññe tīṇi, naupanissaye nava (sabbattha nava), nasampayutte tīṇi, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyā nava, novigate nava.
<< Suddhaup11.1.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma >>
